mapper.select: select pro_no as proNo, pro_title as proTitle, pro_progress as proProgress, pro_start_date as proStartDate, pro_end_date as proEndDate, pro_member_no as proMemberNo from project where pro_member_no = #{memberNo}
select pro_title as proTitle from project where pro_member_no = #{proMemberNo} and pro_no = #{proNo}

select p.post_no as postNo, p.post_title as postTitle, p.post_progress as postProgress, p.post_date as postDate, p.post_content as postContent, p.post_writer as postWriter, p.post_temp as postTemp, p.post_pro_no as postProNo, p.post_tag as postTag, m.member_name as memberName, m.member_picture as memberPicture from post p left join member m on p.post_writer = m.member_no where post_pro_no = #{currentProNo}

select p.post_no as postNo, p.post_title as postTitle, p.post_progress as postProgress, p.post_date as postDate, p.post_content as postContent, p.post_writer as postWriter, p.post_temp as postTemp, p.post_pro_no as postProNo, p.post_tag as postTag, m.member_name as memberName, m.member_picture as memberPicture from post p left join member m on p.post_writer = m.member_no where p.post_pro_no = #{currentProNo} and (m.member_name like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' or p.post_title like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%')

select pro_no as proNo, pro_title as proTitle, pro_progress as proProgress, pro_start_date as proStartDate, pro_end_date as proEndDate, pro_member_no as proMemberNo from project where pro_member_no = #{memberNo} and pro_no not in(select min(pro_no) from project)

select p.post_no as postNo, p.post_title as postTitle, p.post_progress as postProgress, p.post_date as postDate, p.post_content as postContent, p.post_writer as postWriter, p.post_temp as postTemp, p.post_pro_no as postProNo, p.post_tag as postTag, m.member_name as memberName, m.member_picture as memberPicture, pr.pro_title as proTitle from post p left join member m on (p.post_writer = m.member_no) left join project pr on(p.post_pro_no = pr.pro_no) where p.post_pro_no = #{postProNo}

select w.member_no as memberNo, w.pro_no as proNo, w.leader as leader, w.invite_yn as inviteYN, m.member_name as memberName, m.member_Picture as memberPicture from work_on w left join member m on (w.member_no = m.member_No) where w.pro_No = #{proNo} and w.member_no != #{proMemberNo}
select member_picture from member where member_no = #{memberNo}

select p.pro_no as proNo, p.pro_title as proTitle, p.pro_member_no as memberNo, pt.par_no as parNo, m.member_name as parName, pt.par_yn as parYN from project p left join partner pt on(pt.par_no = p.pro_member_no) left join member m on(m.member_no = p.pro_member_no) where pro_no in (select min(pro_no) from project where pro_member_no = #{memberNo})

select m.member_no as memberNo, p.par_no as parNo, m.member_name as parName, p.par_explain as parExplain, p.par_yn as parYN, m.member_picture as memberPicture from partner p left join member m on(m.member_no = p.member_no) where par_no =#{memberNo} and par_yn = 'Y'
mapper.insert: insert into upload values( upload_seq.nextval, post_seq.currval, #{memberNo}, sysdate, #{uploadSubject}, #{uploadPath} )

insert into schedule values(
schedule_seq.nextval, post_seq.currval, #{memNO}, #{proNo}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{scTitle} )
